name: ELEX WooCommerce Product Price Custom Text (Before & After Text) and Discount
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
ELEX WooCommerce Product Price Custom Text (Before & After Text) and Discount plugin helps you to quickly add a before and after text for the WooCommerce product prices. The plugin even allows you to quickly apply a percentage & flat discount to your WooCommerce products. Both discounts for WooCommerce products and the custom text for the product price can be applied globally and even for the individual products.

Features

  • Easily set up before & after text for your WooCommerce Product Prices displayed for your Customers.
  • Apply percentage & flat discount on your WooCommerce Products Prices.
  • Customisation options for Product Price Custom Text & Discounts.
  • Supports WooCommerce Simple and Variable Products .

Few of the Use Cases

  • Apply discount for WooCommerce Product on a percentage & flat rate basis.
  • Apply custom prefix and suffix text with product price across all of the WooCommerce products listed on your eCommerce store.
  • Apply custom prefix and suffix text with product price for only the specific WooCommerce products listed on your eCommerce store.

ELEX Premium Plugins You May Be Interested In

  • WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin
  • Wholesale & Role Based Pricing
  • WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products, Prices & Attributes
  • ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods
  • ELEX Address Validation & Google Address Autocomplete Plugin for WooCommerce
  • ELEX WooCommerce Shipping Calculator, Purchase Shipping Label & Tracking for Customers
  • WooCommerce Google Shopping Integration
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it – you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at the plugin support section on wordpress org. Our team will respond back soon.
sections.changelog:
4.1.2

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.5
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.9

4.1.1

  • Minor bug fixes

4.1.0

  • Option to add Prefix & Suffix in checkout page
  • Minor bug fixes

4.0.1

  • Minor bug fixes

4.0.0

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.4
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.5
  • UI/UX changes
  • Added premium tags for the premium features

3.0.0

  • Made compatible with WordPress 6.3
  • Made compatible with WooCommerce 8.2
  • Made compatible with HPOS
  • Made compatible with PHP 8.2

2.1.0

  • Fixed an issue with the display of price.

2.0.9

  • Fixed an issue with the Tax apply on the Product and Shop page.

2.0.8

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.8
  • Fixed php warnings

2.0.7

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.7
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.2
  • An option to select pages for displaying prefix and suffix with prices.

2.0.6

  • Fixed an issue with discount amount on cart and checkout page.

2.0.5

  • Fixed an issue with Quick edit.

2.0.4

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.4
  • Issue fixes.

2.0.3

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.2
  • An option to apply Custom Text & Discount Settings on selected Categories.
  • Updated Product Page UI.

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.1
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.1

2.0.1

  • Fixed an issue with price strike out

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.0
  • Fixed an issue with Decimal values
  • An option to choose the type of discount to apply

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.7

1.2.0

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.6
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.0
  • HTML tags support for suffix and prefix

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.4

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.2
  • Fixed issue to show read more when no price available for product
  • Fixed issue with auction product price

1.1.7

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 6.1
  • Tested OK with WordPress 5.9

1.1.6

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.9
  • Added Lang file (russian,polish,spanish,germany,sweden,chinese,french) and make WPML compatible

1.1.5

  • Tested with WooCommerce 5.8
